## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lecture, you will be able to:

- calculate shape parameters of the posterior Beta distribution.
- define a conjugate prior.
- calculate expected value, variance, and mode of a posterior Beta distribution.
- use `plot_beta_binomial()` to show update from prior to posterior distribution.
